nodes.text: This courier droid was tortured under the supervision of Jabba the Hutt's droid supervisor EV-9D9.
The silver droid screamed in pain as a traction-test bed pulled its right arm off.

Note that this droid is rather similar to 2-1B in shape and often gets the fanon name 2-1A. This name has never been confirmed. The droid is sometimes confused with the "interpreter droid" that Jabba "became angry with" and was replaced by C-3PO. In the game Star Wars: Battlefront II, he can be seen alone in the torture chamber with a leg almost torn off. Its vocabulator is not the same as the one on a 2-1B surgical droid.
